# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Використовуючи фреймворк aiogram 2, напиши телеграм бота, який буде питати факультет користувача та просити оцінити викладачів, які у нього викладали

Відповідь: .

import logging

from aiogram import Bot, Dispatcher, executor, types

API_TOKEN = 'YOUR_API_TOKEN'

# Configure logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)

# Initialize bot and dispatcher
bot = Bot(token=API_TOKEN)
dp = Dispatcher(bot)


@dp.message_handler(commands=['start'])
async def start_command(message: types.Message):
    await message.reply('Hey! To get started, please enter your faculty')


@dp.message_handler()
async def process_faculty_step(message: types.Message):
    faculty = message.text
    if faculty == 'Science':
        await bot.send_message(message.chat.id, 'Please rate your professors from Science Faculty.')
    elif faculty == 'Law':
        await bot.send_message(message.chat.id, 'Please rate your professors from Law Faculty.')
    elif faculty == 'Medicine':
        await bot.send_message(message.chat.id, 'Please rate your professors from Medicine Faculty.')
    else:
        await message.reply('Sorry, I didn\'t understand. Please enter your faculty')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    executor.start_polling(dp, skip_updates=True)
